Class SendPasswordProperty

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ControllerProperty
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.AsciiDeviceProperty
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.sierragx.SierraGxProperty
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.sierragx.SendPasswordProperty
public class SendPasswordProperty extends SierraGxProperty
Property to send a password and wait for an "OK" response. This will also recognize a "Login incorrect" response.
Author:
John L. Stanley, Douglas Lau

      Parse a response (line of ASCII text) from controller
      Specified by:
      parseResponse in class AsciiDeviceProperty
      Parameters:
      resp - response from the controller
      Returns:
      true = response was successfully parsed. false = we want to see more response strings
      Throws:
      IOException - there's a fatal error, stop looking for a valid response.
